definition: to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
selfie stick/also written 自拍杆[zi4 pai1 gan1]
camera self-timer mode (for delayed shutter release)

sentences.english: This paper designs a new kind of self-timer system for the digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 文章设计了一种新型的数码相机自拍系统。

sentences.english: Turn the mode dial to select self-time mode .
sentences.chinese: 把模式盘转到自拍模式。

sentences.english: We actually took five of the same shot, but all with different angle.
sentences.chinese: 我跟小趟照了五张同样地点但是不同角度的自拍合照。

sentences.english: If you see a couple taking a self-pic, offer to take the picture for them.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看到了一对夫妻在自拍，帮助他们照相。

sentences.english: Self-timer 10-second delay, for taking group photos or self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 自拍10秒延迟采取组照片或自画像。

sentences.english: No one actually stands or stretches like this -- belfie poses are absurd.
sentences.chinese: 没人真的像这样站立或伸展身体，臀部自拍真的很蠢。

sentences.english: Thus, in his instigation , they are willing to do the sexual process.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在男友怂恿下，她们愿意一起自拍性爱过程。

sentences.english: At Hong Fan's home I saw a lot of her self-took realistic pictures.
sentences.chinese: 在洪帆的家里我见到了大量她为做作品自拍的写真集。

sentences.english: Another example described people standing on train tracks trying to get a selfie as a train moves toward them from behind.
sentences.chinese: 另一类例子是当火车临近时人们在轨道上自拍。

sentences.english: Use the self-timer or a remote shutter release to minimise camera shake.
sentences.chinese: 使用自拍模式或者线控快门，以减少相机振动的影响。

sentences.english: And the new front-facing camera makes it easy to take self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 而且，新的前端面对镜头，可轻松进行自拍。

sentences.english: His daughters spoke fluent Mandarin to President Huwhile Obama do selfies on that occassion.
sentences.chinese: 他女儿对胡主席讲流利的中文，而当时奥巴马在自拍。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
camera self-timer mode (for delayed shutter release)
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture
selfie stick/also written 自拍杆[zi4 pai1 gan1]
photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
to take a picture of a person without permission or without their knowledge
